ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] twisting 5, added note
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t a high enough level bard to test it, but surely writing a macro (a social button) would eliminate most of the complaints you have with twisting
ygData.messageBody:
--- John Grady <john_grady@...> wrote:
> This is funny. I can remember every once in awhile someone in my guild
> would say; "I grouped with
> so-and-so and s/he can twist 4+ plus songs, can you?" So I'd explain how it
> ensures that resists
> will be off a percentage of the time, I won't be able to talk or see
> messages fly by, etc., etc.
> I'm mostly retired now, but once I explained it to them, my guild never
> went with this marketing
> pitch.

I haven't a high enough level bard to test it, but surely writing a macro (a
social button) would eliminate most of the complaints you have with twisting four.
